price: (Fir‘aon) wí pé: “Dájúdájú Òjíṣẹ́ yín èyí tí wọ́n rán si yín, wèrè mà ni.”
arabic: قَالَ إِنَّ رَسُولَكُمُ ٱلَّذِيٓ أُرۡسِلَ إِلَيۡكُمۡ لَمَجۡنُونٞ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: qāla inna rasūlakumu alladhī ur'sila ilaykum lamajnūnun
